code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const skillsData={Frontend:['React','JavaScript','HTML','CSS'],Backend:['Node.js','Express.js','REST APIs'],DevOps:['Docker','Jenkins','GitHub Actions'],Cloud:['AWS','Kubernetes','Terraform'],Tools:['Linux','Git','Bash','Prometheus','Grafana']};const Skills=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"mb-12",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-semibold mb-6",children:"Skills"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-5 gap-6",children:Object.entries(skillsData).map(_ref=>{let[category,skills]=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-medium mb-4",children:category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"space-y-3",children:skills.map(skill=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"flex items-center space-x-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-indigo-600 dark:text-indigo-400"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:skill})]},skill))})]},category);})})]});};export default Skills;
